title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.10 - Berth assignment permits; rights granted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1242.10 - Berth assignment permits; rights granted

State Regulations

Berth assignment permits for the use of a berth or berths
at a marine terminal, unless otherwise provided, shall include only the right
to dock and moor watercraft owned or operated by the permittee or by the
company or companies of which the permittee is general agent for the loading
and unloading of cargo, supplies and passengers and to use a portion of the
cargo facilities in connection therewith. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1242.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
